title: Tax Calculator
description: This app will calculate tax user need to pay according to his income based on certain criteria (described in layman term) and app will contain logic & algorithm for taxation system for India, UK, US and few more countries

title: AIO Social(All in One Social App)
description:
This app will combine all the major social media like Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, etc. and will act as an ultimate platform that one needs to be on.
View all your feeds at once, post to all social accounts from single app.

title: Alien Files(Conceptual Idea)
description: Everyone loves to know about alien life forms and the news related to them. One of the best app ideas in science fiction can be Alien Files, as it will act as an ultimate destination to gain the knowledge about extra-terrestrial beings and will give up[ to date information to its users.

title: TracKey
description:
Access Mobile Device remotely, access camera, microphone, record all calls(cloud storage).
Share screen web view, File transfer, Camera stream, Access microphone, Access contacts, Access Call Records/Message, Access user timeline(using google account), Locate device anytime, Reply to message

title: Logical Brains
description: MOBILE APP , GAME & WEB DEVELOPMENT COMPANY: LOGICAL BRAINS is the 21st Century Group of Collaborative and Multidisciplinary minds to develop cutting edge technological end products to word-wide clients.

title: FIP: Funeral Insurance & Planner
description: Plan your funeral ahed of time, we insure your funeral goes smooth, your loved once are treated well & your will is dealth with the way you want it to be.
